text: Ane dariya pana tene tamara vasamam kari didha che, ke tame temanthi (nikalelu) tajum mansa kha'o ane temanthi potana paherava matena gharenam kadhi sako ane tame ju'o cho ke hodi'o temam panine cirine (cale) che. Ane etala mate pana ke teni krpa sodho ane sakya che ke tame abhara vyakata karo
